properties.name: id
properties.description: The unique string of numbers and letters that identifies the board on Pinterest.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The user-entered description of the board.

properties.name: creator
properties.description: The first and last name, ID and profile URL of the user who created the board.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: The date the user created the board.

properties.name: counts
properties.description: The board’s stats, including how many Pins, followers, user's following and collaborators it has.

properties.name: image
properties.description: The user’s profile image. The response returns the image’s URL, width and height.
